statements: SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE 'Master%';
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT key_name, updated_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_value IS NOT NULL;

SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE '%secret%';
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_keys FROM encryption_keys;

SELECT * FROM EncryptionKeys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT key_value FROM EncryptionKeys WHERE key_id = 3;
SELECT data_id, encrypted_data FROM SensitiveData WHERE encryption_key_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM EncryptionKeys WHERE key_id BETWEEN 2 AND 6;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM EncryptionKeys WHERE key_value LIKE '%secret%';

SELECT key_id, key_value FROM EncryptionKeys WHERE key_id > 5 ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT data_id, encrypted_data FROM SensitiveData WHERE encryption_key_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM EncryptionKeys INNER JOIN SensitiveData ON EncryptionKeys.key_id = SensitiveData.encryption_key_id;

SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, created_at FROM encryption_keys ORDER by created_at ASC;

SELECT log_id, data_id, access_time FROM data_access_logs WHERE accessed_by = 'Admin';

SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_name DESC;

SELECT users.username, user_roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_role_mapping ON users.user_id = user_role_mapping.user_id JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mapping.role_id = user_roles.role_id WHERE users.username = 'JohnDoe';
